reviews.text: The custom app Datopia built has completely streamlined how we manage repairs. Our staff picked it up quickly, and customers love getting real-time updates. Can’t thank Jon enough!
reviews.original_author_response: Thank you for your kind words, Rachel. We're glad your app is helping your small business to grow!

reviews.text: Jon rebuilt our website from scratch and made it mobile-friendly. We’re now getting way more enquiries online – highly recommend!
reviews.original_author_response: Thanks Mike! I love what you wanted us to do with your site design. Mobile first design is definitely the way to go!

reviews.text: I was struggling with Excel automations, but Jon’s training made everything click. I can now automate invoices and reports on my own!
reviews.original_author_response: Who knew Excel could be so interesting! Seriously Helen, we're delighted we were able to help. Thanks for having us.

reviews.text: Datopia’s SEO work has made a huge difference. We now show up on the first page for several local search terms. Really happy with the results.
reviews.original_author_response: Thank you for your kind words, Adam. Remember, SEO is not a 'once and done' fix. Keep posting relevant information and your potential customers will keep finding you!

reviews.text: Had an old Mac that was painfully slow – Jon gave it a full clean and tune-up, and it runs like new. Fast, friendly, and professional service.
reviews.original_author_response: Thank you Sophie - we're glad we could help get your business back on track! Really looking forward to see what design you have chosen for your new website build.

reviews.text: The Power BI dashboard has given us a whole new level of visibility into team performance. It’s still evolving, but we’re impressed.
reviews.original_author_response: Thanks Tom! We'll be back soon to create your new custom reports - can't wait!

reviews.text: We brought Jon in to train our team on Power Automate. The sessions were tailored to our workflows and incredibly helpful. Saved us hours each week!
reviews.original_author_response: Thank you Karen! We're always amazed at what ideas people have for automation. Hopefully it'll give you back hours worth of creativity elsewhere in the business.

reviews.text: Brilliant service from Datopia. Our website finally looks professional, and the contact form actually works now. Getting solid leads too.
reviews.original_author_response: Well done, Luke. We knew you had a solid business, it was just a few tweaks on your site to really improve the leads. We're delighted for you!

reviews.text: I wasn’t sure what to expect, but the dashboard Datopia created lets me track sales by product and season. It’s genuinely changed how I plan.
reviews.original_author_response: Thank you Emily. Happy to say you are the first florist that has ever asked us for a data dashboard, so we're delighted you love it!
